headline: Gutfeld on Dana's slip-up
subHeadline: It's day one since 'hole-gate' on 'The Five.'

utterances.speaker: CHARLIE HURT, GUEST HOST
utterances.sentences: Here he is chasing people around with a reptile. Even going into the wall.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: What an (BLEEP)   Now, Trump wasn't here when this happened and I wasn't here, for which I apologize -- usually I sleep here in the men's room. Maybe I could have stopped this. And, frankly, I'm ashamed of my colleagues for letting it pass, especially Juan. As a co-host of one of the top family oriented programs, I'm appalled and, apparently, I'm not the only one. The reaction in the media was swift.

utterances.speaker: BRET BAIER, FOX NEWS ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: Can we just go back to what happened there? Dana said, what?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.sentences: Yeah, we've got her swear jar.   JONAH GOLDBERG, "SPECIAL REPORT" ALL-STAR PANELIST: I don't want to sound like Dana Perino, but --

utterances.speaker: BAIER
utterances.sentences: we're not going to talk about Dana on the next panel. What happened to Dana?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.sentences: I don't know. No, no, I think the whole segment should be about what happened to Dana.    And fans of the show were equally as disturbed by Dana Perino. Now, finally, the public knows what we always knew: Dana Perino isn't so sweet and innocent after all. In fact, she calls herself a role model. To what? Maybe a roll of toilet paper. That filthy person. She claims she's a mentor. Tormentor, more like it.  Because, fact is, this wasn't the first time. Look at what we unearthed, previous examples of similar outbursts towards the nicest of people. Listen to this.

utterances.speaker: BAIER
utterances.sentences: This is 2-year-old, Gracie, distributing breakfast to firefighters coming off the night shift.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: What an (BLEEP) AINSLEY EARHARDT, "FOX & FRIENDS": A homeless man begging for a job instead of food. An overwhelming response and it's gone viral.

utterances.speaker: UNINDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: A father working three jobs surprises his daughter with the dress of her dreams for her 8th grade formal.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: What an (BLEEP)  It's horrifying.  So as you hope and pray this was just an aberration, the scary reality is this is who she is: Dana Perino, monster.
